records.location_details: Islet in Evros river on Greek territory near Petrades/Praggi, around 10km from Didymoteicho, at the confluence of Erythropotamos and Evros rivers.
records.where_clear: Islet in Evros river, Greek territory, near Petrades/Praggi
records.location_text_raw: islet in Evros river on Greek territory near Petrades/Praggi, around 10km from Didymoteicho
records.context_note: A group of 34 asylum seekers (initially reported as 25), including 4 women, 6 children, and one pregnant woman, were stranded on an islet in the Evros river on Greek territory since March 29. Some fell into the water and were wet and cold, described as being in a critical condition. Greek authorities were alerted. Cars (one white, one military) and a drone were observed on the Greek side of the river near the islet, but left without interacting with the group. The individuals declared their intention to apply for international protection in Greece.
records.evidence_quote: we learned that the group we originally reported as consisting of 25 people actually consists of 34 people, among them 7 minors between the age of 4 and 17 as well as one pregnant woman.

records.location_details: Islet in Evros river, at the confluence of Erythropotamos and Evros rivers.
records.where_clear: Islet in Evros river, at the confluence of Erythropotamos and Evros rivers
records.location_text_raw: νησίδα εμφαίνεται στον χάρτη στην συμβολή του παραπόταμου ΕΡΥΘΡΟΠΟΤΑΜΟΣ και του Έβρου.
records.geocodable_query: Confluence of Erythropotamos and Evros rivers, Greece
records.uncertainty_note: No explicit coordinates provided, but the confluence of two rivers is a specific geographical feature.
records.context_note: A group of 46 Syrian refugees were stranded on an islet in the Evros river since April 14. They were in very difficult conditions, without food, water, and blankets. The water level was rising, putting them at risk. Information was requested regarding their registration and access to asylum procedures, as they were reportedly held at TSF N. Cheimoniou.
records.evidence_quote: ομάδα των 46 Σύρων προσφύγων που βρίσκονται ακόμη στη νησίδα... η στάθμη του νερού ανεβαίνει και κινδυνεύουν.
